data.expected_result: The "Nope" button should work by going back to the recent mentions page.
data.short_description: Continue/Nope button doesn't work when you get mentioned in a NSFW channel, via Recent Mentions
data.steps_to_repro: - Get mentioned in a NSFW channel that you haven't accessed on your device - Tap on the recent mentions button - Find and tap on the mention that was done in a NSFW channel - Try and tap on the "Nope" button
